alert.note: Alert for Ingham; Jackson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 5:19PM EDT until August 29 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR JACKSON AND SOUTHERN INGHAM COUNTIES... At 517 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gregory to near Cement City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. These storms have a history of producing damaging winds and power outages. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jackson... Mason... Leslie... Stockbridge... Brooklyn... Grass Lake... Vandercook Lake... Leoni... Spring Arbor... Napoleon... Sandstone... Onondaga... Norvell... Bunker Hill... Pulaski... Concord... Horton... Parma... Dansville... Eden... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
